txt.en: Auctions are held frequently in Avardin, but only when enough merchants commit to attending.

'I am more than willing to help out; however, auctions are very time-consuming, and I have a reputation to maintain. I need assurances that there will be enough merchants in attendance to make it worth my time.\n\n'If you can convince several of the other merchants around Avardin to participate, then I will consider putting together an auction for you. But I caution you: do not waste my time. There is very little I tolerate less than someone wasting my money.'
Merchants can be found around Avardin, in the central Starkmoor.\n\nThere are several merchants within Avardin that may be willing to attend the auction.
'So, the merchants are all willing to come to the auction? It appears this may be my most profitable auction yet, then.'
Bedwur is in Avardin in the central area of the Starkmoor.\n\nBedwur will be pleased to hear that you found several merchants committed to participating in the auction.
'I will not waste my time unless I know that there will be enough people involved to turn a tidy profit.'
Convince Folant to join the auction
Convince Cadvan to join the auction
Convince Hevina to join the auction
Convince Eva to join the auction
